DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this prospective randomized trial is to ascertain whether the use of a cognitive aid improves adherence to best published practices for the management of simulated patients regarding perioperative cardiac evaluation and management.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Cognitive Aid on Adherence to Perioperative Guidelines
DOC.criteria: Any active resident or faculty member will be allowed to volunteer. There are no exclusion criteria (notably we will include residents on academic probation)
